void kBoard::selectedCardItem ( kCardItem *  item  )  [private, slot]

Selected the cardItem after mousePressEvent received by teh cardItem.

Parameters:
kCardItem* item Item selected by mousePressEvent
The method iterates in all items in _mItems. if item found, item is selected.
